mapper.select: select * from inpt_visit where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

SELECT a.ap_order_no AS apOrderNo, b.name, b.in_no AS inNo, b.in_dept_name AS inDeptName, ( SELECT bw.name FROM base_dept bw WHERE bw.id = b.in_ward_id ) AS wardName, a.is_settle AS isSettle, a.status_code AS statusCode, a.crte_time AS crteTime, a.price, a.pay_code AS payCode, a.cheque_no AS chequeNo, a.crte_name AS crteName FROM inpt_advance_pay a LEFT JOIN inpt_visit b ON a.visit_id = b.id WHERE a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND a.visit_id = #{id} order by a.crte_time

SELECT id, type_code as typeCode, crte_time as crteTime, (SELECT name FROM base_disease bd where bd.id = disease_id) as diseaseName, is_main as isMain, crte_name as crteName FROM inpt_diagnose where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and visit_id = #{id}

SELECT id, bed_id, bed_name, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code, status_code, in_no, in_dept_name, in_time, in_disease_name, in_profile, out_time, total_advance, total_cost, total_balance, zz_doctor_name FROM inpt_visit WHERE hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and (name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and (bed_name like CONCAT('%',#{bedName},'%')
and (in_no like CONCAT('%',#{inNo},'%')
and (bed_id like CONCAT('%',#{bedId},'%')
and (in_profile like CONCAT('%',#{inProfile},'%')
and in_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and in_time <= DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 day)
order by in_time desc
